content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains instructions regarding information required for a claim, including
forms required for a Merchant Marine claim
correct voyage entries and release dates on
DD Form 214
information required on the
DD Form 1300
establishing a Merchant Marine claim
Veterans Assistance Discharge System (VADS) entries prior to January 1, 2015
VADS entries beginning January 1, 2015
, and
prior Coast Guard certification of certain Merchant Marine service
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section A - Establishing Veteran Status Based on Merchant Marine Service
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section A
